Saul FabLab
Fabrication Lab at the School of Architecture, University of Limerick, Ireland
Last updated on February 22, 2013

The Fabrication Lab at the School of Architecture, University of Limerick is a research group about digital technologies in architecture and design.

This page is under development, in the meanwhile you can visit our facebook page
